name: Sistemas Concurrentes y Distribuidos
tagline: SCD Exam @ ETSIIT (UGR Universidad de Granada). Programmation of multithreaded and distributed systems. C & Java semaphores and monitors.
body:
#Sistemas Concurrentes y Distribuidos ------------------------------------------------------------- These are the slides and the exercises done for the course "Sistemas Concurrentes y Distribuidos" at the University of Granada, ETSIIT, academic year 2015/16.

I'm human, therefore I make things wrong (often). I hold no responsabilities for possible errors inside the files that could cause bad marks or such.

However, if you reader were to find any error, please do not hesitate and contact me directly with a PM on GitHub. I guarantee discretion.

Enjoy your time at UGR and in Granada, especially if you're in Erasmus.

_Davide Gallitelli_

_Informatics & Automation Engineering student @ Politecnico di Bari, Italy_ ###Workgroup - Davide Gallitelli - Giovanni Mossa
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
